net.grinder.tools.tcpproxy
Class PortForwarderTCPProxyEngine

java.lang.Object
  net.grinder.tools.tcpproxy.AbstractTCPProxyEngine
      net.grinder.tools.tcpproxy.PortForwarderTCPProxyEngine
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable, TCPProxyEngine
public final class PortForwarderTCPProxyEngine
extends AbstractTCPProxyEngine

Simple implementation of TCPProxyEngine that connects to a single remote server.

Author:
Phil Dawes, Philip Aston
